history.proof: intros eps. destruct x. - unfold Rbar_locally'. hauto l: on depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: The reference y was not found in the current environment.
Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

original: unfold is_lim'. intros eps. destruct x. - unfold Rbar_locally'. assert (H: Rabs (y - y) < eps). { apply Rabs_R0. } exists 1. intros y' Hy'. rewrite Rabs_minus_sym. auto. - unfold Rbar_locally'. exists (pos_div_2 eps). intros y Hy. apply False_ind, Rbar_le_not_lt with (y - 0) (eps / 2); auto. - unfold Rbar_locally'. exists (pos_div_2 eps). intros y Hy. apply False_ind, Rbar_le_not_lt with (0 - y) (eps / 2); auto.
